mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def find_three_most_frequent_words(paragraph):
    paragraph = re.sub('', '', paragraph.lower())
    words = paragraph.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    top_words = sorted(word_freq, key=lambda x: (-word_freq[x], x))[:3]
    return top_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_three_most_frequent_words(paragraph):
    paragraph = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', 'MUTATED', paragraph.lower())
    words = paragraph.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    top_words = sorted(word_freq, key=lambda x: (-word_freq[x], x))[:3]
    return top_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_three_most_frequent_words(paragraph):
    paragraph = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', '', paragraph.lower())
    words = paragraph.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    top_words = sorted(word_freq, key=lambda x: (-word_freq[x], x))[:-3]
    return top_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_three_most_frequent_words(paragraph):
    paragraph = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', '', paragraph.lower())
    words = paragraph.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    top_words = sorted(word_freq, key=lambda x: (+word_freq[x], x))[:3]
    return top_words
